ComicInfo.Summary:
As Skye has watched the legends of the Middle Ages come to life in the present, a shadowy figure has secretly been controlling the pieces from behind the scenes. Once called Merlin the Magician he is ready to reclaim the power he once had...even if he has to kill everyone who stands in his way to take it back.
